member.name: ITfLangBarItemSink.OnUpdate
member.summary: Notifies the language bar of a change in a language bar item.
member.param: Contains a set of flags that indicate changes in the language bar item. This can be a combination of one or more of the TF_LBI_* values.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: The ITfLangBarItemSink interface is implemented by the language bar and used by a language bar item provider to notify the language bar of changes to a language bar item.
The language bar item provider obtains an instance of this interface when the language bar calls the provider's with identifier IID_ITfLangBarItemSink.
